# Motor Controller Project

This is a brushless DC motor controller using STM32F407.

## Build Instructions

Use CMake with arm-none-eabi-gcc toolchain.

## My Custom Rules

- Always use HAL functions, never direct register access
- Use DMA for all SPI transfers
- Never block in ISR handlers

## Hardware Reference

Before writing hardware-related code, read the relevant peripheral context file in `.rag/context/peripherals/` (e.g., `spi1.md`, `tim1.md`). These contain register maps with bit-fields, reset values, and base addresses extracted from SVD files.

Never guess register addresses or bit-field positions. Always verify against the indexed documentation.
